title: The best laptops for mining cryptocurrency in 2022
content:
Over the past few years, interest in cryptocurrencies has surged significantly. Not only has the ever-popular Bitcoin grown a lot, but a wealth of other cryptocurrencies have sprung up, including Ethereum, Dogecoin, and many more. Typically, mining cryptocurrency is something that’s done on desktop PCs, and that’s part of the reason GPU prices have skyrocketed

The post The best laptops for mining cryptocurrency in 2022 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Mining cryptocurrency on a laptop isn't the most efficient way to go about it, but if you want try it, we've rounded up your best options.
